supported_getters.arp_table: Returns the ARP table of the device
supported_getters.config: Returns the running configuration of the device
supported_getters.facts: Returns general facts about the device (model, serial, vendor, uptime, etc.)
supported_getters.interfaces: Returns details of the interfaces of the device
supported_getters.interfaces_ip: Returns the IP addresses configured on the interfaces
supported_getters.mac_address_table: Returns the MAC address table of the device
supported_getters.vlans: Returns the VLANs configured on the device
